fields.query_expression: select distinct column_id from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.cloud_dq.dq_summary where dimension = 'COMPLETENESS' and column_id = '$column' and ends_with(table_id, '$table')
select rule_id from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.cloud_dq.dq_summary where dimension = 'COMPLETENESS' and column_id = '$column' and ends_with(table_id, '$table') order by last_modified desc limit 1

select rows_validated from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.cloud_dq.dq_summary where dimension = 'COMPLETENESS' and column_id = '$column' and ends_with(table_id, '$table') order by last_modified desc limit 1

select round(success_percentage,4) from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.cloud_dq.dq_summary where dimension = 'COMPLETENESS' and column_id = '$column' and ends_with(table_id, '$table') order by last_modified desc limit 1

select cast(regexp_replace(metadata_json_string,'[^0-9.]','0') as float64) from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.cloud_dq.dq_summary where dimension = 'COMPLETENESS' and column_id = '$column' and ends_with(table_id, '$table') order by last_modified desc limit 1

select case when score = 1 then true when score >= threshold then true else false end from (select round(success_percentage,4) as score, cast(regexp_replace(metadata_json_string,'[^0-9.]','0') as float64) as threshold from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.cloud_dq.dq_summary where dimension = 'COMPLETENESS' and column_id = '$column' and ends_with(table_id, '$table') order by last_modified desc limit 1)

select datetime(last_modified) from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.cloud_dq.dq_summary where dimension = 'COMPLETENESS' and column_id = '$column' and ends_with(table_id, '$table') order by last_modified desc limit 1

included_columns_query: select distinct column_id from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.cloud_dq.dq_summary where dimension = 'COMPLETENESS' and ends_with(table_id, '$table')
